text: Larginae is a subfamily of insects within the family Largidae, or bordered plant bugs. ==Selected Genera== Arhaphe Herrich-Schaeffer, 1850 Largulus Hussey, 1927 Largus Hahn, 1831 Neolargulus Stehlik & Brailovsky, 2011 Paralargulus Stehlik & Brailovsky, 2011 Pararhaphe Henry and Froeschner, 1988 Stenomacra Stål, 1870 Theraneis Spinola, 1937 ==References== Category:Largidae
title: Larginae
